title: 如何关闭血量回复

replies.author: 卧槽JJ怪
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule naturalRegeneration false
输了之后禁止自动回血 只能药水和金苹果回血了

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: mv插件分世界设置项目    autoHeal: 'true'
